function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict social distancing measures, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of infection spread and constraint efficiency","Impact":"Inability to control disease transmission effectively","Mitigation":"Implementation of data-driven monitoring systems, improved testing and tracking","Technologies":"Data analytics, contact tracing apps, testing technologies","People":"Public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Reliance on essential tasks and job-related travel","Impact":"Increased exposure to infection and potential for community spread","Mitigation":"Provision of protective gear, remote work arrangements, staggered work hours","Technologies":"Remote work technology, telemedicine, protective equipment","People":"Essential workers, general population","Owner":"Employers, government"}]}
